Layout/FirstHashElementIndentation.description:
Description

Checks the indentation of the first key in a hash literal.
Layout/FirstHashElementIndentation.option:
This rule supports the following parameters in your configuration:

EnforcedStyle: special_inside_parentheses (type: str)
SupportedStyles: ['special_inside_parentheses', 'consistent', 'align_braces'] (type: list)
IndentationWidth: None (type: NoneType)
